title: Executive & Personal Assistant
job_overview:
Support the CEO and leadership team with seamless administrative, personal, and project operations to keep us focused, on schedule, and aligned with strategic goals.

Key Responsibilities

Executive Support: Manage calendars, emails, meetings, travel, agendas, and meeting notes.
Personal Assistance: Coordinate errands, appointments, household logistics, and reminders.
Project & Ops: Track milestones, draft SOPs/reports, liaise with vendors/freelancers, and maintain organization systems (Google Drive, Slack).

Ideal Candidate
2+ years as an EA/PA or in operations support for executives
Exceptionally organized, proactive, and discreet
Strong written/verbal communicator with excellent time-management
Tech-savvy with Google Workspace, Slack, Notion or Upgrade to see actual info
Based in the U.S. (CT preferred) and comfortable handling confidential information

How to Apply
Send your resume and new brief video answering:
Why you’re excited about this role?
Your experience supporting executives
Why you’d be a strong fit?
What motivates you to wake up everyday?

We can’t wait to meet our next right-hand person!
